LV@NUHS has the best, most caring and loving teachers. Their programs are great and our daughter learns very well. She enjoys so much going to school. We feel our daughter in good hands.
We are greatful for the efforts they put into keeping the kids safe in terms of foods, health and hygiene.

Learning vision @ NUHS has taught all of my children well and makes learning fun. They also take very good care of my child‚Äôs emotional needs. I can say that my children are academically strong because of the good foundations they have taught my children. Thank you for being such a great school to give my kids the best start in life!

LV @NUHS has been providing a good support to us in looking after our daughter since day 1 when she started her learning journey. The school‚Äôs Curriculum is well balance with English and Mandarin lessons. Our daughter has learned to interact with confident. In my opinion it‚Äôs a school of choice for parents üòä

Teachers are caring  and always have our child interests at heart. Update us promptly on child status and development.

And most importantly, our child is happy being there.

Thank you all the teachers and great achievement

I am writing to express my utmost gratitude and appreciation for the exceptional education and loving care provided by Learning Vision@NUH. The dedication and commitment of the team, led by Ms Marie & Ms Joyce have made a profound impact on our son's crucial early years. It is with fondness that we transition him to Learning Vision@NTFGH - solely due to logistical reasons.

The nurturing environment and thoughtful curriculum are outstanding; while the creativity infused into daily activities, coupled with a strong emphasis on social-emotional growth has contributed immensely to our sons confidence and eagerness to learn. We have witnessed remarkable progress in his cognitive and social skills, thanks to the efforts and expertise of your educators - namely teachers Adrienne, Riz, Syahirah, Monica, Cai Jing-Han ËÄÅÂ∏à and Wang Yi-ShanËÄÅÂ∏à. It has been a joy watching him grow under you team's guidance.

Thank you for fostering a safe, stimulating, and inclusive space. The love and care he receives is written in the big smiles he always wears at the end of each day. We wholeheartedly commend LV@NUH for its unparalleled commitment to early childhood education.
